summary: This module provides an implementation of the Frechet Inception Distance (FID) metric, including a Metric subclass that accumulates feature statistics from real and generated images and computes the distance using covariance and matrix squareâ€‘root operations, along with helper utilities for these calculations and a simple accessor for the final score.
business_intent: Enable quantitative evaluation of generative medical imaging models by measuring how closely synthetic image distributions match real data, facilitating model validation and comparison.
